titleStmt.title: A briefe treatise, concerning the vse and abuse of dauncing. Collected oute of the learned workes of the most excellent deaine doctour, Peter Martyr, by paister Rob Massonius: and translated into English by I.K.
titleStmt.author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
I. K.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Iohn Iugge, dwellyng at the north doore of Paules,
